item.title: Value Strategy S&P 500
item.description: Quantitative Value Strategy “Value investing” means investing in the stocks that are cheapest relative to common measures of business value (like earnings or assets). For this project, we’re going to build an investing strategy that selects the 50 stocks with the best value metrics. From there, we will calculate recommended trades for an equal-weight portfolio of these 50 stocks. Library Imports The first thing we need to do is import the open-source software libraries that we’ll be using in this tutorial.
